comments:
ere are the issues I found:

1) Canceling the edit validation still dirtied the editor (and closing the editor after that left the buffer around)

2) Copying on non-conflicting changes (or single change) prompted twice and still made the editor dirty. After this I got the following exception and the editor no longer would initialize properly:
